bunker.leftBunker:
You left the bunker.
Nobody saw you leave the bunker, but it is not easier to be killed by another mafioso.

bunker.enteredBunkerInfo:
You entered the bunker
You'll be in the bunker until you leave or in 24 hours.

london.alt3: Rob a jewelry shop at Buckingham Palace

feedbacks.success: The robbery was successful, you were able to steal ${money}
feedbacks.successDrugs: The robbery was successful, you were able to steal {money} grams of marijuana.
feedbacks.successHeist: The robbery was successful, you were able to steal ${money}. The money is in the heist group.
feedbacks.heistCode: I heard you have a mission to defuse a bomb. The number on placement {placement} is {number}. Good luck!
feedbacks.failedJail: The robbery was unsuccessful, and you were sent to jail.
feedbacks.cooldownError: You have recently committed a crime. You must wait <t id='countdowntimer'>{minutes} minutes and {seconds} seconds before you can commit another crime.
feedbacks.successPoints: You found {amount} points when you committed a crime!
feedbacks.errorNotInHeist: You are not in an active heist.
